intro: Orania, commonly known as the African violet, is a popular ornamental plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its velvety, waxy leaves and showy, tubular flowers in shades of purple, blue, and white. The plant thrives in warm, humid environments and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Orania's botanical features make it a favorite among gardeners and plant enthusiasts worldwide.
